QuestData.Title: Andorhal, Once and For All
QuestData.Description: Sylvanas will want to know about Thassarian's departure from Andorhal. You resolve to return to the Forsaken-held side of town.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Lady Sylvanas Windrunner at Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Lady Sylvanas Windrunner at Andorhal in Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: See? All it took was a little help from the val'kyr. These creatures are turning to be much more helpful than I had first thought.$b$bNow, on to other matters.
